title: PM arrives in Quetta on one-day visit
content:
QUETTA, May 31 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Saturday arrived here on his one-day visit.
Upon arrival, Acting Governor and Speaker Balochistan Assembly Abdul Khaliq Achakzai and Chief Minister Balochistan Mir Sarfraz Bugti received the prime minister, PM Office Media Wing said in a press release.
Minister for Planning Ahsan Iqbal, Minister for Information and Broadcasting Attaullah Tarar and Jamal Khan Kakar, member of the national assembly, accompanied the prime minister.
The prime minister will visit the Command and Staff College and would participate in a grand jirga.
